ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bit more on Crag Spiders at 25
ygData.msgSnippet: ... DDD CoD Largos Binding, Hymn keeps you more ahead of the game than swapping Purifying Rhythms for Hymn, even when you keep the three instrument swap
ygData.messageBody:
Elijah wrote:

>Over time I have found in an all instrument attack this combo:

DDD
CoD
Largos Binding,
Hymn

keeps you more ahead of the game than swapping Purifying Rhythms for Hymn,
even when you keep the three instrument swap going.<


I wish I had thought to try that. My four song combo of choice was DDD, CoD, Hymn and then a Bellow. I found it was adequate, but that I would go back to the three song combo when things got hairy. I sadly underutilized Hymn (and then Chains) for a long time, until I figured out how potent they could be. (It probably all dates back to that bard who ridiculed me for using the all-song combo when I was 22 and she was 28 because she "didn't like it"...her combo of choice was hymn, chains and anthem with weapons.)

Btw, your posts are making me seriously consider making another bard on my server (or another one, I don't care) and working him up to crags again :)

On a side note, my beloved ogre warrior is now 19 and desperately seeking his surname. He wouldn't last very long in EK soloing crags between 22 and 26 =) (or at least I don't think he would)

Sinistral of Karana


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
